page.title: 18Glass Cutting [continued]
page.content: After that patterns are put on the glass.Then the felt tip line is washed off; the glass is left in acid to give it a glazed look.the acid is washed off and the glass is put in the shop.It needs about 16 people to help make one glass.It takes years to cut glass properly.One of the cutters has been in the trade for 47 years.He started when he was 14. the glass they make goes all over the world.The most far away destination is a small island off the coast of australia.The biggest glass buyers are the Americans.Glass has been made for the Queen.Jeff capes (ex-strongest man in the world)has bought a tankard which would hold five pints of beer! Without the glassworks there would be a lot of reduntant people in and around Tutbury.
